column4: does ubuntu have something that works like ctrl+alt+del? sometimes firefox freezes my desktop and I lose my mouse and cant do anything
you can always ctrl+alt+F1 - F2 - F3... to get to a console, then "ps -A" to see the processes and then "killall process_name" to kill the bugged application.
oh yeah, I forgot about those consoles in the fkeys, thanks
